nodes.text: The Republic Office of Criminal Investigations (ROCI) was the primary criminal investigative service managed by the Republic Judicial Department. The ROCI was charged with coordinating criminal investigations, operating the Sector Rangers, and managing the Republic Enforcement DataCore. It was headquartered at the Judicial Arcology on the planet Coruscant.

At the start of the Clone Wars in 22 BBY the Republic General Ministry initiated the Victory Rationing Orders and Regulation Plan to manage war materials and slow spiraling inflation. By 21 BBY, the program was dealing with problems of fraud and, in response; the ROCI tasked the Sector Rangers with the enforcement of the plan's regulations. With the formation of the Galactic Empire in 19 BBY, the ROCI was reorganized as the Imperial Office of Criminal Investigations.

The Republic Office of Criminal Investigations was first mentioned in Special Ops: The Sector Ranger, an article by James Maliszewski published in the magazine Star Wars Gamer in 2002. It was later mentioned in several in-universe HoloNet articles published in the Star Wars Insider magazine, and was given an entry in the 2008 The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
